# OpenCourts.FYI (Mock Portal)

This repository contains a static mock portal for OpenCourts.FYI, designed to demonstrate dataset catalog UX and machine-readable endpoints (CKAN-style Action API JSON + a DCAT JSON-LD catalog).

## Canonical site

The canonical deployment of this mock portal is:

- https://opencourts.fyi/

The GitHub Pages project-site URL (github.io/<repo>) is non-canonical and may not support all root-relative links referenced by machine-readable feeds.

## Key human pages

- Home: https://opencourts.fyi/index.html
- Datasets index: https://opencourts.fyi/datasets/index.html
- API docs: https://opencourts.fyi/api-docs/index.html
- Governance: https://opencourts.fyi/governance.html
- Contribute (mock): https://opencourts.fyi/contribute.html

## Key machine-readable endpoints (static mocks)

- DCAT catalog (JSON-LD): https://opencourts.fyi/api/dcat_catalog.json
- CKAN Action API examples:
  - Package list: https://opencourts.fyi/api/ckan/package_list.json
  - Package show (NC criminal): https://opencourts.fyi/api/ckan/package_show_nc_criminal.json
  - Package show (SC civil): https://opencourts.fyi/api/ckan/package_show_sc_civil.json
  - Package show (NC probate): https://opencourts.fyi/api/ckan/package_show_nc_probate.json

## Data files (sample)

- https://opencourts.fyi/data/nc_criminal_dispositions_2024_sample.csv
- https://opencourts.fyi/data/nc_probate_estates_2023_sample.csv
- https://opencourts.fyi/data/sc_civil_docket_events_2024_sample.json
